Welcome to Outi Lab

**News: New webpage under construction. More details to follow.

Previous Next

We are a dynamic research group, at FLOW, KTH Royal Institute of Technology. At our research group, we are dedicated to exploring and comprehending the behavior of complex fluids’ flows. To achieve this goal, we actively develop innovative numerical and experimental techniques, allowing us to delve deep into the physics of fluid flows across various canonical and pertinent engineering scenarios. Our primary objective is to provide answers to the scientific questions that we consider most vital. (see Research).

We are grateful for funding from KTH Royal Institute of Technology, ERC and the The Swedish Research Council (VR), and from YieldGAP.

We are looking for passionate new PhD students, Postdocs, and Master students to join the team (more info) !
